inclusion.criterion: Confirmed malignancy, scheduled to receive carboplatin monotherapy, or carboplatin in combination with agents of minimal, low, or moderate emetic potential
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status (PS) of 3 or 4
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of nausea and vomiting or use of major antiemetic agents during the 24 hours before chemotherapy administration
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients receiving radiotherapy within 5 days prior to the carboplatin
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy to any of the 3 antiemetics
exclusion.label: not_met
